message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $10,000. What are your thoughts?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate you being willing to negotiate. However, $10,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it. What do you think?

Bob, I understand that $9,000 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $9,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business. What do you think?
